item.title: Abu Dhabi’s XRG Walks Away From $19 Billion Santos Bid
item.description: Abu Dhabi National Oil Co. dropped its planned $19 billion takeover of Australian natural gas producer Santos Ltd., walking away from an ambitious effort to expand overseas.
